text: Hi there! I still have the issue <@U07L87JHRHB>, can anyone help?
what endpoint are you hitting? Is that error from the OAuth flow?

Yes its from OAuth Flow. Thats the url: <https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/8716179/authorize?client_id=c5600277-557f-4720-bcb5-0056c9455c8e&redirect_uri=https://api.chatarmin.com/api/HubSpot/callback&scope=oauth%20crm.objects.contacts.write%20crm.objects.contacts.read%20timeline%20crm.schemas.contacts.write%20conversations.write%20conversations.read%20conversations.custom_channels.write%20conversations.custom_channels.read%20files&state=662f4ee8a34f90bb22e4272c|https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/8716179/authorize?client_id=c5600277-557f-4720-bcb5-00[…]s.custom_channels.read%20files&state=662f4ee8a34f90bb22e4272c>
Any more info I can help with?
my guess is this has to do with your portal's parcels (which is what the original issue was about)
I wonder if that 8716179 is it?

In order to use custom channels, you need Sales Enterprise or Service Enterprise. Portal 8716179 does not have access to either of these. I think maybe you can get a trial, though, if you'd like? It's probably best to reach your support rep. <@U04B32JHTUZ> who's the right person for them to contact about this sort of thing?
I see,  who can I contact regarding that?
alternately you can play around with it indefinitely in an developer test account <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/getting-started/account-types#create-a-developer-test-account>

<@U04B32JHTUZ> thanks, yeah thats what we have already done, but now it goes to production to a client, who is not on this subscription.

And we are pretty sure they won't be upgrading just for custom-channels :face_with_thermometer:

Is there any way we can "pay for that feature soley?"
